entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 70
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
